owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

issue_number.description: The number that identifies the issue.

since.description: Only show results that were last updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

number_of_comments.description: The number of comments to return
